channel.title: 317 compiling problems :'(
channel.description:
i try to compile whit vista a 317 soruce and it wont work it just saying
that i dont have java and then it links me to java downloads i have download it like 2562 times now...
then it says thats it complite but nothing have happends .....
this is the code
@echo off color 0a title Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo You have sucsessfully compiled pause exit
im using java ''jdk1.7.0_17'' some help plz :(

item.title: 317 compiling problems :'(

item.title: 317 compiling problems :'(
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

This will work if you have a 64-bit operating system. If not, change the path to C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\javac.exe

Read full topic

item.title: 317 compiling problems :'(
item.dc:creator: @beats beats
item.description:
@beats wrote:

try to use my compiler, make sure u change jdk

[code]@echo off color B title BeatsX Server Compiling! echo starting... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java @echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- @echo --beatsX Has Completely Finished its Compiling!-- @echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- pause [/code]

item.title: 317 compiling problems :'(
item.dc:creator: @SpeedFightz SpeedFightz
item.description:
@SpeedFightz wrote:

i try to compile whit vista a 317 soruce and it wont work it just saying

that i dont have java and then it links me to java downloads i have download it like 2562 times now…

then it says thats it complite but nothing have happends …

this is the code

@echo off
color 0a
title Compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo You have sucsessfully compiled
pause
exit

im using java ‘‘jdk1.7.0_17’’ some help plz

Read full topic
